sql-case.value: DELETE FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? AND user_id = ? AND status=?
DELETE FROM t_order WHERE status=?
DELETE FROM `t_order` WHERE `status`='init'
DELETE FROM t_order AS o WHERE status=?

DELETE product_price_history pp WHERE (product_id, currency_code, effective_from_date) IN (SELECT product_id, currency_code, MAX(effective_from_date) FROM product_price_history GROUP BY product_id, currency_code)
DELETE FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? AND user_id = ? AND status=? ORDER BY order_id LIMIT ?
DELETE FROM t_order OUTPUT DELETED.order_id, DELETED.user_id INTO @MyTableVar (temp_order_id, temp_user_id) WHERE order_id = ?
DELETE FROM t_order OUTPUT DELETED.order_id, DELETED.user_id INTO @MyTableVar WHERE order_id = ?
DELETE FROM t_order OUTPUT DELETED.order_id, DELETED.user_id WHERE order_id = ?
DELETE FROM t_order OUTPUT DELETED.* WHERE order_id = ?
DELETE TOP(10) FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ?
DELETE TOP(10) PERCENT FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ?
WITH cte (order_id, user_id) AS (SELECT order_id, user_id FROM t_order) DELETE t_order FROM cte WHERE t_order.order_id = cte.order_id
WITH cte AS (SELECT order_id, user_id FROM t_order) DELETE t_order FROM cte WHERE t_order.order_id = cte.order_id
DELETE t_order, t_order_item from t_order, t_order_item where t_order.order_id = t_order_item.order_id and t_order.status = ?
DELETE from t_order, t_order_item using t_order left join t_order_item on t_order.order_id = t_order_item.order_id where t_order.status = ?
DELETE FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? HASH GROUP
DELETE FROM product_descriptions WHERE language_id = 'AR'
DELETE FROM (SELECT * FROM employees) WHERE job_id = 'SA_REP' AND commission_pct < 0.2
DELETE (SELECT * FROM product_price_history) WHERE currency_code = 'EUR'
DELETE FROM hr.locations@remote WHERE location_id > 3000
DELETE FROM employees WHERE job_id = 'SA_REP' AND hire_date + TO_YMINTERVAL('01-00') < SYSDATE RETURNING salary INTO bnd1
DELETE FROM sales PARTITION (sales_q1_1998) WHERE amount_sold > 1000
DELETE product_price_history
